p: Next, we quantified the results from single-cell RT-PCR for statistical analysis. For this, we performed six independent experiments yielding 185 single-cell measurements. The corresponding histogram of virus yield is displayed in Figure 2A. In addition, we used the image processing program ImageJ (National Institutes of Health, Bethesda, Maryland, USA) to quantify the signal intensities of DI and FL vRNAs of the images obtained from agarose gel electrophoresis.
